text:
──Well, next question.
Do you enjoy being an idol?

Yes! There are times when I'm busy
with lessons and work, but

there are so many things I get to do that I couldn't
have done if I weren't an idol, so it's fun.

I see...! So, the upcoming live performance is also
something you can only do because you're an idol, right!

Thanks to the staff, all the fans,
and──

Producer over there,
I get to do so many things.

(A-Anyway... she's answering honestly,
making this a good interview.)

(──And most importantly,
Hana looks like she's having fun...!)
